scripts.demo: npm run build:common && ng serve wc-demo-forge
scripts.deploy: npm version patch && npm run deploy:all
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:common && parallelshell "npm run deploy:departure-table" "npm run deploy:weather-cloud-solution" "npm run deploy:wc-search-form" "npm run deploy:wc-forecast-plots" "npm run deploy:wc-route-map" && npm run deploy:wc-delay-risk
scripts.deploy:common: npm version patch --prefix projects/common && ng build common && npm run styles:common && npm publish ./dist/common --access public
scripts.deploy:departure-table: npm version patch --prefix projects/departure-table && ng build departure-table && npm publish ./dist/departure-table --access public
scripts.deploy:wc-demo-forge: ng build wc-demo-forge --prod && npm publish ./dist/wc-demo-forge --access public
scripts.deploy:wc-forecast-plots: npm version patch --prefix projects/wc-forecast-plots && ng build wc-forecast-plots && npm publish ./dist/wc-forecast-plots --access public
scripts.deploy:wc-delay-risk: npm version patch --prefix projects/wc-delay-risk && ng build wc-delay-risk && npm publish ./dist/wc-delay-risk --access public
scripts.deploy:wc-route-map: npm version patch --prefix projects/wc-route-map && ng build wc-route-map && npm publish ./dist/wc-route-map --access public
scripts.deploy:wc-search-form: npm version patch --prefix projects/wc-search-form && ng build wc-search-form && npm publish ./dist/wc-search-form --access public
scripts.deploy:weather-cloud-solution: npm version patch --prefix projects/weather-cloud-solution && ng build weather-cloud-solution && npm publish ./dist/weather-cloud-solution --access public
scripts.build:all: ng build common && ng build departure-table && ng build wc-route-map && ng build weather-cloud-solution && ng build wc-search-form  && ng build wc-demo-forge && ng build wc-delay-risk && ng build wc-forecast-plots
